PHRASE.LANG: kName

Body et collants à porter avec des chaussures (noir, femme)

Body e collant da abbinare alle scarpe (nero, da donna)

Leotard with Tights to be Worn with Shoes (Black, Women)

Leotards and Tights for Wearing with Shoes (Black, Female)
kDesc
A black leotard with grey tights. Can be worn with shoes. [#Legal]
Body noir et collants gris. Peut être porté avec des chaussures. [#Legal]
Schwarzer Gymnastikanzug und graue Strumpfhose. Schuhe können darüber angezogen werden.[#Legal]
Body nero e collant grigi. Abbinabili con delle scarpe.[#Legal]
Maillot negro y medias grises. Los zapatos se pueden poner por encima. [#Legal]
黒いレオタードとグレーのタイツ。上から靴を履ける。[#Legal]
검은색 레오타드와 회색 타이츠. 위에 신발을 신을 수 있다. [#Legal]
A black leotard with gray tights. Can be worn with shoes. [#Legal]
黑色緊身衣和灰色緊身褲。可加穿鞋子。[#Legal]
黑色緊身衣和灰色緊身褲。可加穿鞋子。[#Legal]
Black leotards and gray tights. Shoes can be worn on top. [#Legal]
